author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
This is what happens when society glorifies mental illness, and it’s not good for anyone.

A woke mom in Pennsylvania has praised her daughter's teacher for calling her "Ellie-Cat," as the kid "meows" when her name is called during attendance.

Mother at Pine-Richland School District (@PRSchools) in PA thanks a teacher for ENCOURAGING her daughter's meowing behavior in class and for calling her daughter "Ellie-Cat."

Teachers are now encouraging furry behavior in school...

What is happening pic.twitter.com/NhJRPwhKLn
— Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) May 14
title: Woke mom praises daughter's teacher for encouraging her... to believe she is a cat

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
At least one in three children born on Medi-Cal has an “undocumented” mother. This has been going on for over a decade. Gavin Newsom had more than enough time to call out this misuse of tax dollars, but decided to wait until the end of his governorship to at least pretend to care.


Absolutely incredible…

Gavin Newsom is abandoning his signature policy to provide free healthcare to illegal immigrants.

California faces another deficit as healthcare costs exceeded estimates by billions after more illegals signed up than they expected. Clowns.
title: Gavin Newsom Finally Decides To Pretend To Represent Americans With His New Initiative AGAINST Illegal Immigrants

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear why organizations like Nike won't “just do it,” but they have yet to speak out against the destruction of women’s sports, despite pretending to be all in.

XX-XY Athletics posted a new ad targeting Nike, emphasizing that “Over 1900 females have been displaced by males in women’s sports.”

Over 1900 females have been displaced by males in women’s sports.

Yet Nike remains silent.

So, we asked female athletes if they could say one thing to @Nike , what would it be? pic.twitter.com/H42qcaRlNV
— XX-XY Athletics (@xx_xyathletics) May 14, 2025
title: Clothing brand launches new ad demanding NIKE answer for supporting 1900 trans men stealing from actual female athletes

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
When the people who have a monopoly on narrative are solely in it for their political gain, you end up with one of the biggest cover-ups in American history. So, while George Clooney was flabbergasted as to how his lifelong friend Joe Biden failed to recognize him, the last ones who should have been shocked were the media. And rather than hold themselves accountable, many have decided to profit from the lie they fueled.

Authors Jake Tapper and Alex Thompson claimed that Clooney was left "shaken to his core" after realizing Biden was nothing more than a sleeping potato. However, I am old enough to remember when CNN and other outlets chalked this up to nothing more than a “cheap fake.”

If you work at a news organization where one of your colleagues was a propagandis
title: Brian Stelter gets called out as "propagandist" by one of his peers: "ignoring the biggest scandal in America media history"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The Left can’t stand that Trump’s economy is doing great. Today’s show breaks down why that is.

"The left and the media have been rooting for America to fail," Crowder said. "It's very important that you rub their nose in it so that they never think about lying to you about this again."

According to Politico:

Prices climbed at an unexpectedly slow pace last
title: Watch: Trump's Economy Wins Pile Up And The Left Can't Stand It

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
We all knew Joe was basically a sleeping potato, losing his faculties more and more each day. And let’s be real—if you knew, and I knew, and you knew that I knew, then Chuck Schumer definitely knew. So, it’s not exactly bizarre to suggest he played a part in one of the biggest scandals in modern American history.

But you know who else knew? About 99.99999% of the mainstream media, despite all their claims that they, too, were somehow victims in this mess. That’s why it’s not just disingenuous, but hypocritical, for Chuck Todd to point fingers at Schumer while acting like he had absolutely no idea what was going on.

A balding Chuck Todd rips Senator Chuck Schumer for "covering up" President Biden's mental decline.

"Go home. You’re part of the problem. Now yo
title: Chuck Todd, pretending he didn't know Biden was in cognitive decline, unloads on Chuck Schumer: "You’re part of the problem"

author: Brodigan
description:
Women weren’t just gatherers, they were hunters, apparently. South Africa has their own version of Harry Sisson. If you don’t know what that means, wait until you see him. After the dramatic failure of CNN+, the network is back without having learned any lessons. They will launch a new streaming service this summer. How long will this one last? The Left is attacking Trump on the economy. Too bad it’s doing great. President Donald Trump made a trip to Saudi Arabia and all he did was win. We recap the top moments from his very successful trip.


ANCIENT FEMALE HUNTER
title: Sources: Trump's Economy Wins Pile Up And The Left Can't Stand It

author: Brodigan
description:
I know the media lies. You know the media lies. The media knows the media lies. However, if you aren't always on alert, it can be easy to fall for one of the narratives if you aren't careful. Even to Joe Rogan, who should a) know better, and b) should know better because of how much the media has lied about him.

Everyone knew when Donald Trump started the mass deportations, the media was going to isolate a sob story or two and use that as an excuse why Trump shouldn't be allowed to deport anyone. Most notable is "Maryland Man" Abrego Garcia. Trump deported a husband and father from Maryland accidentally, implying that he was just a friend and neighbor who was here legally.

Of course, we all know now:
title: Joe Rogan makes shocking discovery about media's "Maryland Man" hoax (even though he should have known better)

author: Brodigan
description:
It's a day that ends in "y" in the Two-thousand and Twenty-fifth year of our Trump, so of course, when a reporter has an opportunity to ask Tom Cruise a question about Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning, they make it Trumpy. Take notes, other celebrities. Cruise's response was perfection.

Reporters from any genre outside of politics think it's their job to ask about politics regardless of their genre.

They are more concerned with woke slacktivism and only have a marginal interest in the topic they are suppos
title: Tom Cruise needs less than ten words to shut down reporter's silly Donald Trump question during "Mission: Impossible" press tour
